programme.title: Shango
programme.desc: Shango is a Texas Ranger who finds himself up against a former Confederate officer and his gang of thugs who have been terrorizing a local border town in search of gold.

programme.title: Heroes of Fort Worth
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.

programme.title: Tequila
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre
programme.desc: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre - Django has become a bounty hunter who is asked to chase a villain who has kidnapped a young girl.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django is on the trail of some renegade outlaws who raped and killed his wife. En route, he rescues a horse thief from an impromptu hanging. He discovers the man knows who committed the murder. The men team up and head west for revenge.

programme.title: Run, Man, Run
programme.desc: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.

programme.title: Long Live ... Your Death!
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

programme.title: I Want Him Dead
programme.desc: Clayton's sister is raped and murdered. Time for lethal revenge!

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiro's gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: Gunman of Ave Maria
programme.desc: Mann is a gunman informed by a childhood friend that his father was murdered years earlier by his mother and her lover.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: The Executioner of God
programme.desc: A former gunman turned priest seeks vengeance on three bandits who are masquerading as law-abiding citizens.

programme.title: Paid in Blood
programme.desc: Jeff Cameron is Tom Carter and heâ€™s a man on a mission to get revenge for his brother Jerry, who was gunned down after pulling his life savings out of the Rio Canyon town bank.

programme.title: Day of Anger
programme.desc: Bank robbery pulled off by the bank officials, not the usual James gang.
